idea-plugin.name: Dude
idea-plugin.description: This IDEA plugin autocompletes names used in project. - Of values based on type. - Of type based on value name.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.0.9: First release you can use in your editor.
0.0.11: Now imports are suggested in imports section.
0.0.12: Fixed minor issues.
0.0.13: Add suggestions priority.
